display_long_description:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

[media]


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

[media]


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

[media]



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

[media]



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

[media]











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
display_long_description_unprocessed:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75308617_1272215060801635_5042919391744431689_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=K6ZVrqUgDF0Q7kNvwHNX-Em&_nc_oc=AdlUJMtsQOfiHzAEZ_9sGxYnyhjGxOF12s_nlHI2wVE-GoTFHX0qQaNcQauu8dxaooU&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=VmjgQct_70q9JTfFvdinQQ&oh=00_AfGznEMYfzS01iTZDTXZbylEi-g26l37bv83MIQx8cAxMw&oe=67FFEE5D)


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001674_2499265186932117_1940974824575956372_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=ESVhxpf0hfoQ7kNvwHFtyJD&_nc_oc=AdnlkomeqoCmmV0g8vSFeYr1p63p8XP_5-JAz31h33mdz9QjO3GeWrNa9qHAo2bHUYM&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=VmjgQct_70q9JTfFvdinQQ&oh=00_AfGrM1JRzbhI5ac0mcjmQXJm37tORTbubn3wUhk7yQ-9-g&oe=68000852)


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75375767_1695057634657861_9198351083050459907_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=l4XSnduvbsMQ7kNvwFAeEmG&_nc_oc=Adn85uiNIbrecnG9wXI2opqVy7r8KNeh4exc0R_VfkFtxQXIcYvVbvspqzPFSB424ts&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=VmjgQct_70q9JTfFvdinQQ&oh=00_AfEWlbkd4vqlfU1ZLvnHehNXXKbZdjmE1uPavOKRwz5S-Q&oe=67FFD623)



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031608_1046525513655988_8291945262237532410_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=jD9IE1J_DqUQ7kNvwHKRZCK&_nc_oc=AdkgpYnvnv2XV-eAsxWLRyZK0L43lbnRAtwU0mRSTJxjtUsNxnZKZ6jtwhsPvGop6b0&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=VmjgQct_70q9JTfFvdinQQ&oh=00_AfHOKDJD-IOM4GruNChia_8lE2Ya_hDdxNGihdjrF3BJNQ&oe=680004EE)



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982508_850050307226020_5528409964007448806_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=CHcwURGumEYQ7kNvwEX_dlk&_nc_oc=AdnC5SJmyHtGysuRoe-IH1C-TnGSorDmg1d3NTB7pE8EOZVIF5-krHEO8iAM8XLZAJM&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=VmjgQct_70q9JTfFvdinQQ&oh=00_AfE4BSV5dg7LTrhxaG4FGNLBe7QtGstD_n1uFauTh6EI4A&oe=67FFD496)











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
